posts.postText:
I'm not adding anyone else to a rank on the forums.
This is due to the fact that our forums have been attacked recently, plus I've gotten reports and warnings about possible hacker attempts and DDOS attempts, including a recent successful attack which changed user's passwords.
Going forward, if they don't have a rank on the forums at the time I'm writing this, they will not have one.
If they need access to it, they'd have it already.
If you REALLY FEEL someone needs access to the staff corner, let me know but I don't want tons of posts in it, because it is a serious board.

>> >> Ben":1c98knwv]a seriouc board. 
Really? 
THE KEYS ARE CLOSE TOGETHER.

>> Ben":3g67vv6e]including a recent successful attack which changed user's passwords. 
Does this mean he's been removed?



Finally?

Guys, don't joke around, this is seriouc.

Anyways, I've NEVER had a problem with our site before o.o

>> Guys, don't joke around, this is seriouc.

Anyways, I've NEVER had a problem with our site before o.o 

Aside from that one time you couldn't login and had to create dumdadumdoo2
Flame and that guy still need access.

I'm not adding them.
I don't want anyone else having admin CP access.

>> Ben":3t5p98mg]I'm not adding them.
I don't want anyone else having admin CP access. 
I meant to the staff corner.

Woohooo I finally see this place!

Also thank you Pharaoh.

>> Woohooo I finally see this place!

Also thank you Pharaoh. 
Yeah, I just now am seeing posts in the Staff Corner, despite being a TTT Mod for months.  Was I just added or something?  Do you need to be a Forum Mod or just a Server Mod to gain access?  I'm Confused :(, Maybe I just found this by accident.
I think Ben personally gave us permission for this section thingy

Well the First time I even heard of it was when I posted about Storms Coding Abuse and Dum said it was being taken care of In the staff only Section, Maybe he Gave it to us because even though we aren't Forum Mods, we still are Technically Staff.
You are not forum mods, and Ben did specifically give you access to the staff corner.to answer your question
